title: It's A 10 Miracle Leave In Product, 4-Ounces
description: It's A 10 does 10 things instantly: 1. Repairs dry damaged hair. 2. Adds shine. 3. Smoothes and controls frizz. 4. Seas and protects hair color. 5. Detangles. 6. Prevents split ends. 7. Stops hair breakage. 8. Creates silkiness. 9. Enhances natural body. 10. Flat iron spray and thermal protector.

title: Marilyn Brush Teasing and Backcombing Brush
description: The teasing brush is made with 100% natural boar-bristles and has an elevated center row for added texture. It has an extra long grip for user comfort.

title: Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Special Shampoo & Special Conditioner Duo 33.8 oz
description: Ordinary Shampoos need not apply! Get a head start every morning and experience the tingle of invigorating tea tree oil, peppermint and lavender. Help wash away impurities as hair becomes fresh and clean, full of vitality and luster. Color safe and ideal for all hair typesYour hair deserves special treatment. Experience the natural magic of tea tree oil, peppermint and lavender. Enjoy an invigorating tingle that leaves hair and scalp looking and feeling healthy. The moisturizing botanical blend tackles tangles for instant manageability, Color safe and ideal for all hair types.

title: Free and Clear Hair Shampoo and Conditioner, 12 Oz
description: Free and Clear Shampoo and Conditioner - Doctor Recommended Hair Treatment System For Beautiful Hair Without The Common Chemical Irritants. Ideal for anyone who wants to avoid the common chemical irritants found in most shampoos - Free and Clear Shampoo and Conditioner gently and effectively cleanse both hair and scalp. These non-medicated hair care products are hypoallergenic and protein free. The Shampoo lathers up rich while it gently cleans your hair, removes dandruff and controls oily scalp. The Conditioner prevents tangles and hair breakage, making hair easy to manage and style. Free and Clear is pH balanced and great for all hair types including permed and color-treated hair. Both products contain NO perfume, lanolin, dyes, formaldehyde, or parabens and are recommended by dermatologists because they are both gentle and effective.

title: Vanicream Lite Lotion, Pump, 16 Ounce
description: Vanicream lite skin care lotion is a face, hands and body lotion specially formulated to moisturize dry skin. Carefully chosen ingredients effectively moisturize the skin without exposing the user to common chemical irritants. Goes on non-greasy. Dye free, perfume/fragrance free, lanolin free, paraben free, formaldehyde free.

title: Suave Professionals Hair Spray Aerosol Touchable Finish Extra Hold 9.4 oz.
description: This firm hold finishing spray dries quickly on contact to lock in your style while remaining touchable.  The humidity defense complex helps smooth away frizz and flyaways.  For long-lasting fast-drying hold.  *Based on salon testing using Sebastian Re-Shaper hairspray.  Sebastian and Re-Shaper are registered trademarks of Sebastian International, Inc.   Meets CA and NY Clean Air Standards.

title: NEUTROGENA Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, 114 Towelettes Vanity
description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes gently and effectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil and make-up. They remove 99.3% of your most stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara, with just one towelette. This package includes four refills (25 count each) and two travel refills (7 count each).
